page.title: 04Wimbledon Park
page.content: In the 18th century this was the park of a great mansion.Now it is a popular place with local people for walking or for sport and is very busy at weekends. The lake,about 0.5 Km long, is used by children learning to sail small boats. There are swings, a mini golf course,an open area for football, a bowling green with clubhouse and twenty tennis courts There is a Stadium which until recently had a running track used by local clubs for training and for cross country races but the council could not afford its upkeep.In July 1985 the DOE is to hold a Public Enquiry about the Stadium the Corinthian Casuals,a famous amateur football team who have no home ground, want to lease the Stadium.Local people object because they are afraid this will mean floodlights and a new road and much more traffic nearby.
